sections.heading: dialing-announcing device, defined
sections.text: Automatic dialing-announcing device means a device which selects and dials telephone numbers and automatically plays a recorded message.SourceLaws 1993, LB 305, § 2;R.S.1943, (1999), § 86-1202;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 100.

86-238.Automatic dialing-announcing device, defined.

Automatic dialing-announcing device means a device which selects and dials telephone numbers and automatically plays a recorded message.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 305, § 2;R.S.1943, (1999), § 86-1202;Laws 2002, LB 1105, § 100.
